name: PathMaker (SlowDevelopment)
description:
PathMaker is a hill climb game where you have to draw your own path in order to get to the finish line.

The game has 6 cars you can unlock while completing the 15 levels of the game.

The game saves your progress automatically.

Assets : https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZBIz4xeJsOkB7j259-QEWYafF2w_C73DCdA1FEZR31A/...

Created by: Paul Istoc

Made in Godot.
